attributes.action: Declare amnesty for people who have stayed in the uk for 10years or more
attributes.additional_details: If the government declare amnesty now, a lot of people will be able to study and work in the nhs field, such as careers, nurse and doctors etc, nhs need support and our nurses are overworked due to short staff.
attributes.background: I believe there are many illegal migrants who are skilled in careers workers and qualified nurse and doctors but who don’t have permit to work in the uk, NHS need more staff and it’s glaring our nhs is suffering during this pandemic, it will be a plus able to declare amnesty now for people to work

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312998
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301696
